mapper.insert:
insert into sys_dictionary
sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, type, valuekey, value, name, ordering, att1, att2, att3, att4, att5, att6, att7, att1_info, att2_info, att3_info, att4_info, att5_info, att6_info, att7_info, date_att1, date_att2, num_att1, pic_id, num_att3, num_att4, remark, show_u3d_model,
#{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valuekey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordering,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att1Info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2Info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att3Info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att4Info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att5Info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att6Info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att7Info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateAtt1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateAtt2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{numAtt1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numAtt3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{numAtt4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showU3dModel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select:
select id,type,name,VALUE,valuekey,att1,att1_info,ordering,num_att3 from sys_dictionary where is_deleted = 0 and valuekey not like 'basic_%' and type in
#{type}
select id,type,name,VALUE,valuekey,att1_info,att1,att2,att3,num_att3,num_att1 from sys_dictionary where type = #{type} and is_deleted = 0 and value = #{value}

SELECT t1.id,t1.value,t1.valuekey,t1.type,t1.att1_info,t1.name
FROM sys_dictionary t1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary t2 ON t2.type = t1.valuekey WHERE t2.valuekey = #{valueKey} UNION SELECT t2.id,t2.value,t2.valuekey,t2.type,t2.att1_info,t2.name FROM sys_dictionary t1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary t2 ON t2.type = t1.valuekey WHERE t2.valuekey = #{valueKey}

select * from sys_dictionary where type = #{type} and is_deleted = 0
and name like concat ('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT value, name, att2 FROM sys_dictionary WHERE type = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND value IN
#{item}
